context: Task is to add R to the README.md file in the posthog-js monorepo. The README currently lists 7 JavaScript/TypeScript SDK packages. The task requires adding R (presumably a new R SDK package) to this list following the existing format and conventions.

questions.question: Where should the R package entry be added in the Packages section?
options: Add as the last entry after [@posthog/ai](./packages/ai/README.md) to maintain chronological order
Add as the first entry to highlight R as a new/featured package

questions.question: What is the exact package name and path for the R SDK package?
options: posthog-r with path ./packages/r/README.md (matches naming convention like posthog-js, posthog-node)
A different name/path (specify exact package name and relative path)
